Uses of Class
io.atomix.DistributedResource

  • Packages that use DistributedResource 
    Package Description
    io.atomix
    Core Atomix APIs, including AtomixClient and AtomixReplica.
    io.atomix.atomic
    Provides distributed atomic variables such as DistributedAtomicValue.
    io.atomix.collections
    Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap and DistributedSet.
    io.atomix.coordination
    Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedLeaderElection and DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging.

    • Uses of DistributedResource in io.atomix

      Classes in io.atomix with type parameters of type DistributedResource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DistributedResource<T extends DistributedResource<T>>
      Base class for fault-tolerant stateful distributed objects.

      Creates a new instance for the given resource.

      Creates a new instance for the given resource.
      <T extends DistributedResource<?>>
      CompletableFuture<T>      		 Atomix.get(String key, Class<? super T> type)

    • Uses of DistributedResource in io.atomix.coordination

      Subclasses of DistributedResource in io.atomix.coordination 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DistributedLeaderElection
      Provides a mechanism for coordinating cluster-wide resources with a strong leader.
      class  DistributedLock
      Provides a mechanism for synchronizing access to cluster-wide shared resources.
      class  DistributedMembershipGroup
      Provides a mechanism for managing group membership in a distributed system.
      class  DistributedMessageBus
      Distributed message bus.
      class  DistributedTopic<T>
      Async topic.
